titleStmt.title: Nevves lately come on the last day of Februarie 1591. from diuers partes of France, Sauoy, and Tripoli in Soria. Truely translated out of the French and Italian copies, as they were sent to right honourable persons

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Wolfe, and are to be sold at his shop, ouer against the great South doore of S. Paule,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Newes out of France.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop, ouer against the great South doore of S. Paule
